question.title: Make openapi-generator models package private
question.body:
I am writing a library which uses openapi-generator generated models and I don't want to expose these models to the consumers of my library.

Is there a way to make my models package-private and compile them to the same package as my integration code? There probably is a better way of doing this using modules but that's not really an option for me.

I have seen examples online with Mustache templates for altering the generated code but that does not seem like a good solution. Do I need to keep my own version of all of the generator template files just to change one keyword? Or is there a better way of doing this?
